Gautama: Nyayasutra
with Vacaspatimisra's Nyayavarttikatatparyatika


Input by members of the SANSKNET-project
(www.sansknet.org)


This GRETIL version has been converted from a custom Devanagari encoding.
Consequently, many word boundaries are not marked by spaces.

These and other irregularities cannot be standardized at present.

In spite of hundreds of corrections, the text is in need of proof-reading!

To give the text some structure, sutras were added, 
and verse numbering was adapted, where necessary.
For these and other purposes, the text was checked 
against the ed. by Anantalal Thakur (New Delhi 1996).

iti /

tadidamuktam--÷àstrasya puruùa÷reyo 'bhidhàyakatvàditi //

kevalasya duşkhasyàtyantikã nivçttiş ÷reyaş puyaùapravçttyaïgam /

vivekinastu àyatimàlocayantaş svargamapi kupitaphaõiphaõàmaõóalacchàyapratima ityapajahati /

     NyS_1,1.6: prasiddhasàdharmyàtsàdhyasàdhanamupamànam //

     NyS_1,1.16: yugapajj¤ànànutpattirmanaso liïgam //

     NyS_4,1.1: pravçttiryathoktà //


atha manaş parãkùànantaramudde÷alakùaõakramànurodhena pravçttiş parãkùituü yuktà, sà kasmànna parãkùyata iti ÷aïkàniràkaraõàya såtramityàha /
manaso 'nantaramiti /
( 446/3 ) pravçttiryathoktà (så.1) //

asya ÷eùastathà parãkùità yathà lakùità tathà parãkùitetyarthaş /
pçcchati kiü punariti /

uttaram /
yàvaddharmàdharmà÷rayamiti /
ekadravyetyekasminnevàtmani varttataityarthaş /
avasthità na tu buddhyàdivadà÷utaravinà÷inãtyarthaş /

tena na sàmànyavi÷eùàbhyàü vyabhicàraş /
pràyaõàdãtyàdi÷abdena sukhàdikùayo 'pavarga÷ca gçhyate /
